full_threads.body: +3H to Harvest
@rica +3hrs Thanks!

Hi Theo,

Sure, confirming we have updated the animation speed.
https://belance.com.au/product/product-accessories/#
The wording I mean
Looks good! Could it be a tiny fraction faster?

Hi Theo,

We have cleared the site and server cache. Can you please try now?
Thanks Joel. The menu definitely appears a lot better but I'm not seeing the words appearing down line by line like in the video?

Hi Theo,

Here is an updated version of the menu. Please see the link below:
https://belance.com.au/product/product-accessories/#
Hi Joel - how are you going with this?

Hi Theo,

We are still working on this one as we need to customize and override some scripts.
We will update you early next week.

Hi Heath,

When do you expect this to be ready?

Thanks,

Theo

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Thanks Heath. Yes please proceed with the animation on the menu. It just doesn't flow right, needs to be a bit smoother when opens up.

Thanks

Theo

Thanks Heath!

I was wondering how do we change the shipping rates for products?

I'd like to make free shipping for the gft card internationally because it will be sent virtually

Hi Theo,

I hope you are well. The new gift card template is here: https://belance.com.au/product/giftcard/

We have hit the 10 hr estimate of time. We can continue on the animations, but will need approx 1 hour of additional time. Please let me know if you would like us to proceed?
@ricaR +5mins Thanks!

@heath I have done the gift card.

https://belance.com.au/product/giftcard/

Just the additional changes with animation of the menu, this would take a bit of time to override the animation popup stuff.

But without the 'Size Guide" obviously for the Gift Card

Thanks!

Thanks Joel.

That's a lot better but there's still something a bit off with the way it disappears, feels very intense and quick. I was wondering if we could do the words maybe appear slowly and if that would help. I've put an example here:

I've explained it here: https://www.loom.com/share/714d6a34132d4d1886536b58b5b447dc

Also I forgot to ask but we'd need a product template for gift cards.

Basically the same as this one with the gravity form option to select different amounts: https://belance.com.au/product/belance-gift-card/

But in our current format like this one: https://belance.com.au/product/product-with-singular-sizes/

Thanks!!

Hi Theo,

We have adjusted the animation of desktop menu and fixed the mobile menu.

Regarding backorder, You have to manually set each variation stock. please see the attached.
One more thing, the mobile menu options is strange when it opens up. Have done another video here: https://www.loom.com/share/28ea7187fbd94ca5806ac0aad721b7d8
Also the menu is still strang, it still appears very quickly then disappears in a type of flash. I've done a video here of my screen: https://www.loom.com/share/5bea285191db49f093e3ea980682ed18

So if I wanted to make this product for example available in back order where do I go to do that?

https://belance.com.au/product/product-with-mixed-sizes/

Or do I have to use this product https://belance.com.au/product/backorder-product/ and then add different sizes?

Thanks,

Theo

Thanks Joel, I'll go through all of that!

Just noticed this icon sometimes appears in the cart - any idea why? Can it be removed?

Hi Theo,

Here is an update. Please see below:

To edit Mobile Menu
- https://belance.com.au/wp-admin/nav-menus.php?menu=144

To edit Desktop “Ready-to-wear” Menu
- https://belance.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=19353&action=elementor
- You can change the image by changing the background image of the column

To edit Desktop “Made to wear” Menu
- https://belance.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=19353&action=elementor
- You can change the image by changing the background image of the column

2 column Home page
- https://belance.com.au/home-2-columns/
- https://belance.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=19453&action=elementor
- You can change the image by changing the background image of the column

Here is a list of Submitted “Notify - Out of stock”
- https://belance.com.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=bis_notifications

Regarding Out of stock items that can still be bought. We have setup a product called backorder.
- https://belance.com.au/product/sample-product/
- This can be setup through the backend “Inventory > Stock Status > On Backorder”. The text can be changed as well.
